texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: After an unfortunate death of my  Yubikey NEO  and a huge mistake on backups, I've come to realize that it's time for a new GPG key. My new one is already up on  Keybase  and there's a  plain text copy on my resume site .
texts.text: After an unfortunate death of my  Yubikey NEO  and a huge mistake on backups, I've come to realize that it's time for a new GPG key. My new one is already up on  Keybase  and there's a  plain text copy on my resume site .

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you're using a key for me with a fingerprint of
texts.text: If you're using a key for me with a fingerprint of

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: For the impatient, here's the easiest way to retrieve my new key:
texts.text: For the impatient, here's the easiest way to retrieve my new key:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Always ensure that you have complete backups of  all of your keys . I made a mistake and forgot to back up my original signing subkey before I moved that key to my Yubikey. When the NEO died, so did the last copy of the most important subkey. It goes without saying but I don't plan on making that mistake again.
texts.text: Always ensure that you have complete backups of  all of your keys . I made a mistake and forgot to back up my original signing subkey before I moved that key to my Yubikey. When the NEO died, so did the last copy of the most important subkey. It goes without saying but I don't plan on making that mistake again.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Always make a full backup of all keys and make a revocation certificate that also gets backed up. There's a  good guide on this topic  if you're new to the process.
texts.text: Always make a full backup of all keys and make a revocation certificate that also gets backed up. There's a  good guide on this topic  if you're new to the process.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This is the first Yubikey failure that I've ever experienced. I've had two regular Yubikeys that are still working but this is my first NEO.
texts.text: This is the first Yubikey failure that I've ever experienced. I've had two regular Yubikeys that are still working but this is my first NEO.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I emailed Yubico support earlier today about the problem and received an email back within 10-15 minutes. They offered me a replacement NEO with free shipping. It's still a bummer about the failure but at least they worked quickly to get me a free replacement.
texts.text: I emailed Yubico support earlier today about the problem and received an email back within 10-15 minutes. They offered me a replacement NEO with free shipping. It's still a bummer about the failure but at least they worked quickly to get me a free replacement.
